results.title: A systematic review and meta-analysis of genotype-based and individualized data analysis of SLCO1B1 gene and statin-induced myopathy
results.text_hl: There were some reasons suggesting that individuals who received @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ may have higher risk of @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@ than those who took @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

results.title: Addition of statins to the standard treatment in patients with cirrhosis: Safety and efficacy
results.text_hl: Likewise, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ should not be administered to @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_End_Stage_Liver_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D058625 @@@Model for End-stage Liver Disease@@@ score > 12 and/or Child-Pugh class C because of the high risk of severe @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@muscle injury@@@.

results.title: Activation of Transposable Elements in Human Skeletal Muscle Fibers upon Statin Treatment
results.text_hl: Recently, a group of genes and molecular pathways has been described to participate in statin-induced @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@myopathy@@@, caused by either @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ or @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@, although the mechanism by which changes in gene regulation occur was not studied.

results.title: Dynamic urine proteome changes in a rat model of simvastatin-induced skeletal muscle injury.
results.text_hl: We therefore examined urine proteome changes associated with @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@SAMS@@@. Here, we established a @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009135 @@@SAMS@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model by intragastric intubation with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (80 mg/kg).
